column1: Blackwolds Roost was an Arnor ruin in Archet-Dale in The Lord of the Rings Online.The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
column3: The Ruins of Bree-land  After Arnor was divided the fortress was held by Cardolan. After the fall of Arnor the fortress fell into disrepair. In  a band of Blackwolds made their camp in the ruinThe Lord of the Rings Online
